name: Leggy Transformation
description:
Type the letter highlighted to progress in your journey through the desert. Click on the embed if it's not registering your key presses.

Made for the Trijam #46. The theme was "13 Legs" and the game was created in just under 3 hours. I had a hard time coming up with an idea for this jam. I tried to make a sort of spooky mood with the music and the passage that you are typing. Made with Godot.

Source:

https://github.com/iwilliams/trijam-45

Music: Spooky Dungeon

https://opengameart.org/content/spooky-dungeon

Art: Twemoji
https://github.com/twitter/twemoji

Text: Metamorphosis by Franz Kafka, translated by David Wyllie
http://www.gutenberg.org/files/5200/5200-h/5200-h.htm

Font: VCR OSD MONO by Riciery Leal
https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font
